fontTheory.description: The typography system for this resume aims to strike a balance between professionalism and readability. It utilizes classic serif and sans-serif fonts for easy reading while maintaining a clean and modern appearance.
fontTheory.readability: The serif body text enhances readability for longer sections, while the sans-serif headings and titles provide a clear hierarchy and visual contrast. The monospace font ensures code and technical details are easily distinguished.
fontTheory.hierarchy: The hierarchy is established through font styles, sizes, and weights. Headings are bold and larger, while body text is regular and slightly smaller for easy scanning.
fontTheory.fontPairings: The serif and sans-serif font pairing creates a harmonious balance between traditional and modern styles. The monospace font complements the overall system by providing a distinct look for technical content.
